summary:
Strong expertise on media, agency management and production. 12 years on building levers to drive both efficiency and effectiveness gave to me a very clear and deep knowledge of particularities and similarities across all markets in Europe, USA and Latin America, as well as an expertise on obtaining inputs and managing expectation across the organization with top and middle management; removing organizational obstacles, managing resistance and assessing organizational readiness.
Very experimented and expert on Strategic Sourcing and Category Management methodology with 15 years of experience on handling local, regional and global roles, focusing on changing complexity by relevance to leverage scale;

[{'date': {'start': {'month': 10, 'day': None, 'year': 2012}, 'end': {'month': None, 'day': None, 'year': None}}, 'role': 'Dream maker', 'company': {'id': None, 'name': 'Make-A-Wish® Brasil', 'logo': 'https://media.licdn.com/dms/image/C4D0BAQEsTPo_1sptww/company-logo_400_400/0/1540417108646?e=1700697600&v=beta&t=PWAGmwwnT3dSR4UyJDxhS21nlvxTnH9QtsOkVzsErV0', 'url': 'https://www.linkedin.com/company/make-a-wish-brasil/'}, 'cause': 'SOCIAL_SERVICES', 'description': 'I was one of the 4 Dreams makers that materialized a dream of a kid who was diagnosed with cancer.

We had a great time with the kid and his family to understand what was his dream about and motivations to make the dream really meaningfull to him. After that, we run to materialize the Dream, looking for partners and ways to fund it.

The great moment was when the Dream comes real. Amazing Experience.'}]
